org.apache.hadoop.hdfs

Interface DFSInputStream.ReaderStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DFSInputStream.ByteArrayStrategy, DFSInputStream.ByteBufferStrategy
    Enclosing class:
    DFSInputStream

    private static interface DFSInputStream.ReaderStrategy
    Wraps different possible read implementations so that readBuffer can be strategy-agnostic.
